actions.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Energy and Natural Resources.

actions.committee: Committee on Energy and Natural Resources Subcommittee on National Parks
actions.text: Committee on Energy and Natural Resources Subcommittee on National Parks. Hearings held.

official_title: A bill to establish the Alabama Black Belt National Heritage Area, and for other purposes.
short_title: Alabama Black Belt National Heritage Area Act

summary.text: Alabama Black Belt National Heritage Area Act - Establishes the Alabama Black Belt National Heritage Area in Alabama. Designates the Center for the Study of the Black Belt at the University of West Alabama as the local coordinating entity for the Heritage Area, requires the Center to submit a management plan for the Heritage Area, and sets forth procedures for the approval or disapproval of such plan.

titles.title: Alabama Black Belt National Heritage Area Act
A bill to establish the Alabama Black Belt National Heritage Area, and for other purposes.
